meanings.definition: A private viewing or preview of an art exhibition.
meanings.sent1: The exclusive vernissage allowed only a few guests to see the art before the public.
meanings.sent2: The gallery hosted a vernissage for art collectors and critics to preview the new exhibit.
meanings.sent3: At the vernissage, the artist pretended to be a mysterious art critic to surprise everyone.
meanings.sent4: The vernissage was like a secret garden where only a select few could enter and admire the paintings.
meanings.sent5: The vernissage was so hush-hush that it felt like being part of a special club.

meanings.definition: The opening ceremony of an art exhibition.
meanings.sent1: The vernissage marked the official start of the art show with speeches and champagne.
meanings.sent2: Attendees eagerly awaited the vernissage to witness the unveiling of the new artworks.
meanings.sent3: During the vernissage, the artist accidentally tripped and knocked over a display.
meanings.sent4: The vernissage was a grand spectacle, like the curtain rising on a theater performance.
meanings.sent5: The vernissage felt like the first page of a book, setting the tone for the entire exhibition.

meanings.definition: A social event or gathering to celebrate the opening of an art exhibition.
meanings.sent1: The vernissage turned into a lively party with music, laughter, and mingling.
meanings.sent2: Art enthusiasts eagerly awaited the vernissage to enjoy the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: During the vernissage, the guests started an impromptu dance-off in front of the sculptures.
meanings.sent4: The vernissage was a joyful occasion, like a family reunion filled with art and joy.
meanings.sent5: The vernissage buzzed with excitement, like a hive of bees ready to celebrate art.
